column2: All members of the Working Committee of the UNP have not been made parties
to this application, and therefore necessary parties are not before Court;
In any event, decisions of the Working Committee of the UNP are not amenable
to the Writ jurisdiction of the Court of Appeal;
The  Returning  Officer  (1st  Respondent)  exercises  only  a  ministerial  function  in
terms  of  Section  10A(1)(a)  of  the  Ordinance  and  is  thus  not  amenable  to  the
writ jurisdiction of the Court of Appeal.
